name: ConfirmDialog
description: ConfirmDialog uses a Dialog UI that is integrated with the Confirmation API.

group.label: group
group.title: Optional key to match the key of the confirmation, useful to target a specific confirm dialog instance.

breakpoints.label: breakpoints
breakpoints.title: Object literal to define widths per screen size.

draggable.label: draggable
draggable.title: Whether the dialog can be relocated by dragging.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
